WHITE LINEN NIGHT

Thursday - May 16, 2019

Dress in your favorite white linen and join the Eastern Shore Art Center for White Linen Night where art will take center stage! Enjoy live music, local fare from your favorite restaurants and an exciting art auction that will allow you to take home a special piece from a local artist. Tickets: $75 per person Only 300 Tickets to be sold! *** All proceeds will benefit the Eastern Shore Art Center’s ongoing mission to educate and promote the arts. ***

  


Eastern Shore Art Center

    NOTIFY ME
    • News Flash
    • Calendar

    NEWS - PARKS & RECREATION AFTER-SCHOOL PROGRAM WILL BE CLOSED TODAY 4/18/2019
    With the inclement weather expected this afternoon, the Ocean Springs Parks and Recreation After-School Program will not be picking up from the schools today.
    click here to view the full version

    NEWS - Blood Drive Cancelled 4.18.19
    The American Red Cross Blood Drive at City Hall today has been CANCELLED due to weather conditions. Please call 228.230.1950 if you have any questions.
    click here to view the full version

    NEWS - Waste Pro 4.18.19
    We are continuing to pick up until it is too dangerous for our large trucks and personnel to be out today. We are making every effort to get everything already out picked up before the worst of the storm hits.
    click here to view the full version

    NEWS - Offices Closing at 3pm 4.18.19
    Due to inclement weather conditions, non-emergency offices will close today at 3pm.
    click here to view the full version

    PUBLIC MEETING - Katrina Development Block Grant
    The City of Ocean Springs was awarded a grant from the Mississippi Development Authority, Disaster Recovery Division, through funding made available by the Katrina Development Block Grant (KCDBG) Program. A public meeting will be held Wednesday, May 1, 2019 from 5:00pm – 6:00pm, to be held in the Board Room at City Hall located at 1018 Porter Avenue, Ocean Springs, MS.
    click here to view the full version


    Click here to view the full Calendar for City of Ocean Springs events.

    Click here to view the full Calendar for Ocean Springs Chamber of Commerce events.


    Mayor's Youth Council's Easter Egg Hunt
    4/20/2019 | 10:00 AM | Mayor's Youth Council's Easter Egg Hunt Saturday, April 20th 10am to 12pm Located: Clay Boyd Park All ages are invited to hunt for Easter eggs and take pictures with the Easter Bunny!

    Tree Protection Committee Meeting
    4/23/2019 | 9:00 AM | Tree Protection Committee Meeting meets every 2nd and 4th Tuesday of the month. It is held in City Hall Board Room.

    1699 Weekend of Discovery
    4/26/2019 | 2:35 PM | 1699 Weekend of Discovery Location: Downtown Free to attend

    1699 Race of Discovery 5k and Kids 1 Mile
    4/27/2019 | 8:00 AM | 1699 Race of Discovery 5k and Kids 1 Mile

    1699 Weekend of Discovery
    4/27/2019 | 2:37 PM | 1699 Weekend of Discovery Location: Downtown Free to attend
